org.apache.river.jeri.internal.runtime

Class LocalHost

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.river.jeri.internal.runtime.LocalHost

  • public class LocalHost
extends Object
    This was common security code in all ServerEndpoint.enumerateListenEndpoints calls, rather than duplicate this code, due to it's performance and security sensitivity, it has been separated here to avoid duplication.

      • logThrow

        static void logThrow(Logger logger,
                     Level level,
                     Class sourceClass,
                     String sourceMethod,
                     String msg,
                     Object[] params,
                     Throwable e)
        Logs a throw. Use this method to log a throw when the log message needs parameters.
        Parameters:
        logger - logger to log to
        level - the log level
        sourceClass - class where throw occurred
        sourceMethod - name of the method where throw occurred
        msg - log message
        params - log message parameters
        e - exception thrown
